meanings.meaning: close look to make sure sth is safe/correct

examples: I did a quick visual check of the engine.
I do a spell check on all my emails.
The band wants to do a sound check before the concert.
I'll just have a quick check to see if the letter's arrived. A thorough check is made before the luggage is put on the plane. We're running a police check on all applicants for the job.
Police are keeping a close check on the house.
I have to go for a dental check.
a routine check on the factory
Leaving some fields fallow provided a natural check on insect populations.
You need to keep your temper in check!
The law acts as a check on people's behaviour.
